statements: SELECT * FROM recovery_codes;
SELECT user_id, recovery_code FROM recovery_codes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, recovery_code FROM recovery_codes WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT recovery_code, created_at FROM recovery_codes ORDER BY recovery_code ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, recovery_code, created_at FROM recovery_codes WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes WHERE recovery_code LIKE '%ABC%' AND created_at >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_codes FROM recovery_codes GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY total_codes DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_codes FROM recovery_codes WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2023-01-01 00:00:00' GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_codes FROM recovery_codes WHERE recovery_code IN ('123456', '654321') GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) = 2 ORDER BY total_codes ASC;
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes;
SELECT user_id, recovery_code FROM recovery_codes WHERE created_at > '2021-09-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT recovery_code, created_at FROM recovery_codes WHERE recovery_code = '123456';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes;
SELECT user_id, recovery_code FROM recovery_codes WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, device_id FROM devices WHERE device_name = 'Mobile';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM devices WHERE device_name = 'Laptop');
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, recovery_code FROM recovery_codes WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND device_name LIKE 'Phone%';
SELECT device_name, user_id FROM devices JOIN users ON devices.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_used FROM devices ORDER BY last_used DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS access_count FROM access_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes WHERE used = FALSE;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY last_used DESC;
SELECT user_id, recovery_code, generated_at FROM recovery_codes WHERE used = false;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT user_id, device_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE success = true ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes;
SELECT id, user_id, recovery_code FROM recovery_codes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, last_used FROM devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT session_token, last_accessed FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY last_accessed ASC;
SELECT * FROM recovery_codes WHERE used = FALSE ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, user_id FROM recovery_codes WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, recovery_code FROM recovery_codes WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' OR user_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN TIMESTAMP '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND TIMESTAMP '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, device_name, last_used FROM devices ORDER BY last_used DESC LIMIT 5;
